instructions: Connect HTC One A9s to the computer using the supplied USB cable. On HTC One A9s , unlock the screen if it's locked. On the pop-up message that asks whether to use USB for file transfers, tap Yes . If you don't see this message, slide the Notifications panel open, tap the Use USB for notification, and then tap File transfers . You'll then see options for viewing or importing files on the computer screen. Choose to view files. Copy the files from your computer to HTC One A9s , or vice versa. After copying the files, disconnect HTC One A9s from the computer.
